Description: NullPointerException is thrown out when undo transfering from template item to report item.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached file, it used a template.
2. Double click on the image template.
3. Then undo transfer to report item. NullPointerException is thrown out.
java.lang.NullPointerException

<Updated>
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached file, it used a template.
2. Transfer the image template to a report item, then preview.
3. Switch to layout editor.
4. Then undo transfer to report item. NullPointerException is thrown out.
Check if the tree viewer in data exploer is disposed.
